affineTransformation._instruction: Enter the affine transformation map; corresponds to srow_x, srow_y, srow_z

dataLocation._instruction: Add the location of the file or file bundle in which the image is stored.

dataType._instruction: Add the data type of this nifti file, corresponds to datatype

dimention._instruction: Enter the dimentions of this NITFI file, corrisponds to non zero numbre in dim array of nifti file after the dim[0]

gridSpacing._instruction: Enter the voxel width along dimension of this NITFI file, corrisponds to pixdim[1] to pixdim[4], in the same order as first four elemts of dimention

intentCode._instruction: Add the intent_code field can be used to indicate that the voxel data has some particular meaning, corresponds to intent_code

intentName._instruction: Enter name for the data used, corresponds to intent_name

niftiVersion._instruction: Add the version of this NIFTI, corresponds to magic field of NIFTI header (e.g., ni1, n+1, n+2)

numberOfDimentin._instruction: Enter number of dimentions in this NITFI file, corrisponds to first numbre in dim array of nifti file

quaternion._instruction: Enter the quaternion representaion of rotaion matrix in order of b,c,d; corresponds to quatern_b, quatern_c, quatern_d

quaternionShift._instruction: Enter the quaternion shifts in order of x,y,z; corresponds to qoffset_x, qoffset_y, qoffset_z

spatialUnit._instruction: Add the spatial unit of this image, corresponds to first part of xyzt_units.

temporalUnit._instruction: Add the temporal unit of this image, corresponds to second part of xyzt_units.
